name: Amazing service box Addons For WPBakery Page Builder (formerly Visual Composer)
author: Ziauddin

sections.description:
Amazing service box Addons is made by experienced designers and developers to fulfil all your needs while development of websites. It’s completely responsive, easy to use with tons of options. Which makes this plugin biggest, unique and most advance. Plugin is already used by lots of designers and developers and they have given very positive feedbacks. We keep improving plugin so you have the best available version with latest features as per trends.

Biggest Collection of Addons For WPBakery Page Builder formerly Visual Composer – WordPress Plugin

Features

  • 100% Responsive all elements
  • Font Awesome Icon Support.
  • SVG image support.
  • Custom image support.
  • Unlimited color option.
  • Limitless Service Box anywhere in the theme.
  • Easy user interface.
  • Works with any theme.
  • All Major browser supported.
sections.installation:
1. Go to plugins in your dashboard and select ‘add new’
  2. Search for ‘Amazing service box’ and install it
  3. Now You will have all options available in your Visual Composer Panel.
  4. Check Setting of plugin to know extra options.
  5. You can start building website using brand new addons.
sections.changelog:
= 2.1.0=
* Compatibility Upgrades
* Bugs Resolved

= 2.0.0=
* BIGGEST UPDATE FROM THE LAUNCH
* Added New Elements with options, Total elements now 22
* Added WP Core Shortcodes, total number 5
* Plugin options panel to on/off elements
* Responsive issues resolved
* Cross Browser compatibility
* Security Bug fixes
* Lots more improvements and upgrades
* Turned down some bugs!

= 1.1.0=
* Bug Fixes
* Elements improved
* New styles in pricing table
* User based Updates
* Browser compatibility

1.0

  • Initial Release

2.4.3

  • Tested with wordpress 5.2
